name: Colorful Love
description:
Game made in 72h for the Ludum Dare 50 (Theme: Delay the inevitable)

Some things are inevitable.

In this colorful platformer, you control two cute slimes that can't stand to get close to each other, but are physically tied together.

Play alone, or with a friend, and learn a valuable relationship lesson.

Controls:

WASD  - Move big slime

Arrows- Move small slime

R - Reset

Music video link https://youtu.be/16TnQcY9hF4
